name: Hopper (2015)
description:
A prototype  remake of my earlier game, Three Blind Mice. An action memory  game. Tap a sequence of movement commands with the arrow keys, then watch your character follow the commands to collect stars, avoid the water, and land safely on the grey stone platform. Art used from Daniel Cook's free game graphics at Lost Garden.

Blog post about the procedural generation: http://blog.patkemp.com/2015/08/procedural-generation-for-hopper.html
